text: "It's Tricky" is the fourth and final single released from Run-DMC's third album, Raising Hell. It was released early in 1987 through Profile Records and was co-produced by Rick Rubin and the group themselves. The song peaked at No. 57 on the Billboard Hot 100 and No. 21 on the Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs. ==References== Category:1987 songs Category:Run-D.M.C. songs
title: It's Tricky
